CustomField.description: This field will be used to check if the second passenger is a dependent child (the first can't be since at least one passenger need to be the main passenger)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Children can be included when they reach the age of 4 only when the main traveller is either the employee to whom the voucher is issued or the spouse/equivalent. They are considered dependants provided they remain in full time education to the age of 24.
CustomField.label: Is passenger 2 a dependent child?
